邧字的基本解释

邧
yuán
古邑名，中国春秋时属秦，在今陕西省澄城县境。

邧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuán］
［《廣韻》愚袁切，平元，疑。］
［《廣韻》虞遠切，上阮，疑。］
春秋时秦邑名。故地在今陝西省澄城县境。

邧字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　邧； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1269第09
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?愚袁切，音元。【廣韻】秦邑名。【左傳·文四年】晉侯伐秦，圍邧新城。　又【唐韻】虞遠切【集韻】【正韻】五遠切，?音阮。義同。

邧字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
邧字的起名意思

暂无。

Yong
Basic explanation of words
Yong
yuán
The name of the ancient town, which belonged to Qin Dynasty in the Spring and Autumn Period of China, is located in Chengcheng County, Shaanxi Province.
Yong
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuán］
["Guang Yun" Yu Yuan Qi, Ping Yuan, doubt. ]
["Guang Yun" Yu Yuanqie, Shang Ruan, doubt. ]
The name of Qin Yi in the Spring and Autumn Period. The old place was in Chengcheng County, Shaanxi Province.
Yong
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　邧; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1269 to 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Yu Yuan cut, phoneme. 【Guangyun】The name of Qin Yi. [Zuo Zhuan·Wen 4th Year] The Marquis of Jin defeated Qin and encircled Xincheng.　[Tang Yun] Yu Yuan cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Five Yuan cut,? Yin Ruan. The same meaning.
Yong

Yong
Name meaning
Nothing.
yuán, yuǎn
собств. ист., геогр. Юань (город царства Цинь на территории нынешней пров. Шэньси в эпоху Чуньцю)
